name: Happy free kill
description:
Goat-sama is angry, sacrifice must be made !

 

Introduction :

 You are the minion of Goat-sama, you have to give him some sacrifice to make him happy. Go get some animals from the forest for him and appease his anger. And… Maybe… If you want to be the favorite of Goat-sama… You could steal the offering of your friends and become the best one !

Goal of the game :

 Happy free kill is a party game for 2 from 4 players. To win you have to take animals on the map and bring them on the altar.

 

Control :

 Happy free kill require a gamepad to be played and two players minimum.

  • -Joystick left to move.
  • -X To grap animals.
  • -B to hit players.
  • -Start to pause.
Contact :

Happy Free Kill is a party game made on 48h for the Ludum Dare 43 by 6 students from E-Artsup Lille (France).
